name: Scarlet Flame War General, Bravaldin
effect: [CONT](Deck):While this card is revealed by the ability of your vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, this card is also regarded as grade 1 and 2.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, [COST][bind a card from hand face down], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: In the name of the Scarlet Flame! Intercept and destroy our foes!

name: Vairlord
effect: [overDress] - "Trickmoon" (You may place it by stacking it on the specified unit instead of normal calling it to (RC))[CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by the [overDress] ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to a total of two Arms cards from your hand or drop, arm one to your vanguard from among them, and put the rest into soul.[DressBoost] - [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts in the [overDress] state, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card your vanguard is armed with.
flavor: The light that shines deep within despair――I wish to grasp that together with you.

name: Red Jeweled Beast, Galnet
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Draw a card.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: A fiery passionate flame! I just love things like that!

name: Evil Eye Dragon, Ominagruzio
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Ominagruzio" in its card name or up to one "Masque of Hydragrum" from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one trigger unit from your drop, bind it, and until end of turn, your opponent cannot increase [Power] with trigger effects of cards with the same trigger icon as any card in your bind zone.
flavor: Even after achieving vengeance, an unquenchable thirst remains within the Evil Eye.

name: Evil Eye Dragon Emperor, Ominagruzio Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Ominagruzio" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Ominagruzio" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose up to one trigger unit from your drop, bind it, and this unit gets "[CONT](VC):All of your opponent's cards with the same trigger icon as any card in your bind zone get [Shield] -5000, and your opponent cannot increase [Power] with those trigger effects." until end of turn.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two back row rear-guards into soul], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: The Evil Eye burns on... Thirsting for unparalleled power.

name: Purple Jeweled Beast, Almethys
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - [Counter-Charge 1].・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: You're really going to give it to me? That sincere heart of yours?

name: Cardinal Mors, Orfist Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Orfist" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Orfist" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose a World card from your drop, and put it into the order zone.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put any number of World cards from the order zone into drop], and call Shadow Army tokens up to the same number of cards put into drop for this cost to your (RC) with a unit. If you called two or more tokens, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: The one who shall fulfil our covenant, is the blade that shatters the endless night.

name: Gore Gravidia, Nordlinger Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Nordlinger" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Nordlinger" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose up to three Meteorite cards from your drop, and put them into hand.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put any number of Meteorite cards from the order zone into drop], for every two Meteorite cards put into drop for this cost, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If four or more Meteorite cards were put into drop for this cost, your trigger effects activate twice until end of that battle.
flavor: Our distant utopia... We must obtain it with these hands――

name: White Jeweled Beast, Synthetica
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Choose a set order from your drop, and put it into hand.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The insatiable heart of an explorer shall create a brilliance that surpasses the real thing.

name: Sword of the Nation, Bastion Accord
effect: [CONT](VC):This unit is also regarded as "Apex Ruler, Bastion".[CONT](VC):All of your grade 3 or greater front row rear-guards cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, and get [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose one of your grade 3 or less rear-guards, [Stand] it, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card with "Bastion" in its card name from hand], and until end of that battle, this unit performs drive checks." until end of turn.
flavor: The ruler that stands upon the apex shall now become the sword that protects all its people.

name: Sagely Dragon, Wisdomclaw Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of the deck. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck, and you may call it to an open (RC) if it is a unit card. If you did not call a card, put it into soul.
flavor: What colored future do those enlightened eyes wish to see?

name: Yellow Jeweled Beast, Tolpaz
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. If it is not your main phase, [Rest] that called unit.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Show me your pure and unclouded will.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast King of Calamity, Magnolia Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Magnolia" in its card name.[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your rear-guards on (RC) with a Dragontree marker can attack from the back row, and get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Magnolia" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], and this unit gets "[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard attacks a vanguard from the back row, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it." until end of turn.
flavor: Carrying all calamity within itself, all in order to protect the world tree, and its brethren.

name: Green Jeweled Beast, Elmedar
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - [Soul-Charge 2], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Make sure to spin it together properly――the tale of love and hope.

name: Rosarium Fairy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][retire another rear-guard], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Granfia" or "Lianorn" in its card name, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, choose one of your other back row rear-guards, and increase this unit's [Power] by that unit's [Power] until end of that battle.
flavor: My lord♪ Isn't it beautiful? This garden that I've been taking care of!

name: Explosives Equip Dragon, Launcharred
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a rear-guard in the XoverDress state, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: Prayers are always carried within our hearts, and exist with us.

name: Dragritter, Basila
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your battle phase, put this card into soul, choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: The fangs of a dragon will never miss a chance to strike.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Dvistiya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with the [DressBoost] ability and up to one Arms card each from among them, reveal them, choose up to one card from among the revealed cards, put it into hand, discard the remaining revealed cards, and shuffle the deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your (VC) has two or more Arms, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: I see you've found it; what you truly wish for.

name: Wild Bullet of Dust Storm, Clifton
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your opponent's rear-guard was retired by the ability of your vanguard this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC).[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to three cards from your soul, and if you chose one or more cards, return them to the deck and shuffle it. If you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: The dust storm spins in reverse, and dances in the sky.

name: Diabolos Rapid-carrier, Geno
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When your vanguard attacks, if you are in "Final Burst", [COST][Soul-Blast 2], for every two cards in your damage zone, choose one of your rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and [Stand] it. If you [Stand] two units, they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Front Row (RC):At the end of your turn, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a normal unit from your soul, and you may put it into hand.
flavor: From here on, everything's a highlight! Don't miss any of it!

name: Misery Wing Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each type of trigger icon in your bind zone.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if there are two or more types of trigger icons in your bind zone, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.
flavor: The voices of agony and the expressions of anguish gave the dragon even more power.

name: Fell Count, Ayperos
effect: [CONT](RC):When any of your opponent's normal units would be put from (RC) into soul by the ability of your vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, your opponent puts those units on the bottom of their deck in any order instead of into soul.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for every five cards in your soul.
flavor: Your unique abilities, do you not wish to explore their depths?

name: Ruin Collector
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may [Soul-Charge 1].[CONT](RC):When this unit would be put into soul for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Ominagruzio" in its card name, it may be regarded as putting two units.
flavor: You wish to devour... us? How amusing.

name: Dragontree Wretch, Psyber Kaitul
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your (RC) without any Dragontree markers, and put a Dragontree marker. Search your deck for up to one "Masque of Hydragrum", reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: A fallen spawn of the Dragontree. Its delicate feathers sing praise to its hideousness.

name: Cardinal Principle, Opart
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Orfist" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one World card, discard it, and shuffle the deck.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC), if your vanguard is "Cardinal Mors, Orfist Masques", you may call a Shadow Army token to (RC).
flavor: They only look towards the future.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Lifle Royar
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if two or more of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's card was imprisoned in your Prison this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, imprison it in your Prison, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.
flavor: I wonder if we can obtain more equipment?

name: Bizarre Visitor
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your vanguard is "Gore Gravidia, Nordlinger Masques", choose up to two Meteorite cards from your hand, and put them into the order zone. If you put one or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, if you put two cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.
flavor: Fall. Fall. Make the shining star fall.

name: Grandeur Edge Dragon
effect: [CONT](Hand):When a grade 3 card would be revealed from your hand for the cost of your card's ability, this card may be revealed as two cards.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have a vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Lift the sword up high into the sky, so that all that should be saved will not be overlooked.

name: Knight of Slash Sins, Nehalenia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, put it on the bottom of the deck, and your opponent draws a card.
flavor: Goodbye. Let's meet in the next life?

name: Delta Append Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into hand, and put the rest on the top or bottom of the deck. If you persona rode this turn, choose up to one [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your hand, reveal it, and put it on the top of the deck.
flavor: I'll make sure to support you all the way from start to finish!

name: Divine Sister, Dacquoise
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed by your card's ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. If it was placed by the ability of your vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, that placed unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll show them just how smart I am!

name: Forced Grow Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than during the battle phase, if your vanguard is "Sylvan Horned Beast King of Calamity, Magnolia Masques", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose grade 3 or less cards from your drop up to the same number of Dragontree markers on your (RC), and call them to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, choose one of your vanguards with "Magnolia" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Bloom with madness. If you wish to know the reason you're born.

name: Prevailing Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if this unit was placed on (RC) by a card's ability this turn, [COST][retire this unit], choose a normal order or set order from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: Do what is right and dive deep to the bottom of the sea.

name: Unwavering Maiden, Yolanda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][retire two other grade 1 or less rear-guards], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Let's end this meaningless battle quickly.

name: Wave-crest Brave Shooter
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Flagburg" in its card name or up to one "Ascendance Assault" from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Counter-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, you may put this unit into soul.
flavor: Until the main platoon arrives, I'll hold down the fort here!

name: Masque of Hydragrum
effect: Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.[ACT]Drop:If you have a grade 3 vanguard without "Masques" in its card name, [COST][reveal a grade 3 card with "Masques" in its card name from hand], and ride the card revealed for this cost as [Stand]. If you rode, put this card into soul, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and you did not persona ride this turn, you activate persona ride.
flavor: This is proof and the key to connecting with the great Dragontree.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Yatara
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your (VC) has two or more Arms, or you have a rear-guard with two or more originalDress, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Halt. Do not defile this sacred place.

name: Whiplash Dragon, Whipasaurus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard's grade is greater than your opponent's vanguard's grade, you may [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: Bigger is superior! Obviously!

name: Fierce Strike Dragon, Fillingrex
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have a vanguard with [Critical] 2 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: I'll load it up to the max! To the point where the barrel can't be emptied!

name: Sealed Blaze Hammer, Suriiya
effect: Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" (After being played, the specified vanguard arms it. If a new Right Deity Arms is armed, put this card into drop)[AUTO](VC):When this card is armed, choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, retire it, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put this card into drop], choose a card with the Right Deity Arms ability and a different card name from this card from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: A strike of oath that holds the power of extinction.

name: Cannonfire Bullet Rain Colossus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], for each type of trigger icon in your bind zone, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Did you know? Your future is pitch black.

name: Diabolos Tailbacker, Derek
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you "Final Rush", this unit gets "[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time." and [Power] +5000 until end of turn. At the end of that turn, retire this unit. (This ability is mandatory)
flavor: Don't think about what comes next. Feel the heat of this moment right now.

name: Blinklock Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into soul from (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: He flies towards the blinking light of time.

name: Almajest Celesphere
effect: Play this if you have a vanguard with "Astroea" in its card name![Counter-Charge 1], choose three trigger units from your drop, and put them into soul. If your card with "Astroea" in its card name was removed this turn, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: I wonder, whose sorrows are raining upon the heart of the temple?

name: Gould Beltas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your (RC) has three or more Dragontree markers, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one set order, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
flavor: This, too, is a form of improvement.

name: Schwarzer Zwei
effect: [CONT](RC):If your opponent's rear-guard was retired by the ability of your set order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Here's another blow! Just in case!!

name: Schwarzer Eins
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your grade 2 or greater set order is put into the order zone, [COST][put this unit into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: Let's finish this quickly so that I can go back to resupply.....!

name: Midnight Recycleaners
effect: Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of set orders in your order zone, choose a card from among them, bind it face down, and shuffle the deck. At the end of that turn, put the card bound by this effect into hand.
flavor: They said they don't need it anymore... Even though it's so delicious~

name: Unfeigned Sky Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 card with "Bastion" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you revealed a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Allow me to witness your resolve.

name: Knight of Appetency, Knodons
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your (RC) has three or more Dragontree markers, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: You can become strong. Everything lies in those results.

name: Magic of Cycling Wind, Parryris
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is attacked, if it is the fifth battle of this turn or more, [COST][bind this unit], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: Don't worry! I'll make it swish swoosh with wind magic!

name: Sanctus Sanctus
effect: All of your rear-guards get "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: The holy underjaw bares it fangs towards the sinner.

name: Maundering Loyalty
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 3 or greater unit card from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: Its flesh may decay, but its loyalty will not.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lepcor
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your "Sylvan Horned Beast King of Calamity, Magnolia Masques" is placed on (VC), you may call this card to (RC). If you called this card, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The current king. Terrifying, yet benevolent.

name: Romantic Bloom, Pentelanse
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from drop, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: A story full of romance is right behind each page.

name: Blessing to the Flowering Buds
effect: Until end of turn, all of your units with original [Power] 5000 or less get [Power] +10000 and "[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, you may return this unit to hand.".
flavor: The magic of blessing that heralds blossoming.

name: Intense Rage Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your (VC) has two or more Arms, or you have a rear-guard with two or more originalDress, this unit gets [Power] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Only the fire that roasts flesh and scorches souls will quench my thirst.

name: Ground Gouge Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a vanguard with [Critical] 2 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Ground crushing, and gouging.

name: Quaking Bullet of Dust Storm, Roderick
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Cataclysmic Bullet of Dust Storm, Randor", if your opponent has no rear-guards, draw a card.[ACT](Soul):[COST][Retire a [Rest] rear-guard], call this card to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Stand down, this is where I'll lead!

name: Stealth Dragon, Futaiten
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: There is no turning back for me!

name: Scarlet Flame Artillery Soldier, Arsharp
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each card in your bind zone. If it gets [Power] +10000 or more, retire this unit at the end of that battle. (This effect is mandatory)
flavor: Even your life, is but a tool to end your enemies.

name: Blaze Battle Monk, Zanshou
effect: [CONT](RC):All of your units with originalDress in the same column as this unit get [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: We're here for you. Don't carry all of it and more on your own.

name: Wish upon the Moon
effect: Choose a "Trickmoon" from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets "[AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, choose one of this card's outerDress units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn." until end of turn.
flavor: On this night――the sprite of despair will be clad in moonlight.

name: Sealed Blaze Axe, Tvashtar
effect: Left Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" (After being played, the specified vanguard arms it. If a new Left Deity Arms is armed, put this card into drop)[CONT](VC):During the battle your vanguard attacked, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this card into drop], choose a card with the Left Deity Arms ability and a different card name from this card from your drop, and arm it to your vanguard.
flavor: Smash through all obstacles.

name: Gruesome Scythe Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard a trigger unit from hand], choose a column, and retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in that column.
flavor: A single choice gave birth to a tragic spectacle.

name: Unfathomable Juggler
effect: [CONT](RC):If your rear-guard was put into soul by the ability of your vanguard this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: Will you give me a greater applause for my skills?

name: Evil Eye Beast, Ominaowls
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Evil Eye Beast, Ominacrowg", search your deck for up to one trigger unit, put it into soul, and shuffle the deck. If you put a card into soul, draw a card.
flavor: It's still not enough. To decimate the hated enemies......

name: Glaciate Gracie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your vanguards, it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for every ten cards in your soul. If you chose a unit with "Baromagnes" in its card name, it gets +10000 instead of +5000.
flavor: Why do I have to give you a hand with this?

name: Apathetic Usurper
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: It's a very efficient place for collection. But that's all there is to it.

name: Evil Eye Beast, Ominacrowg
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 or greater card with "Ominagruzio" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: It changes its appearance, to a memory far mightier.

name: Piercing Flash Evil Spearman, Halgenti
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Evil Eye" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Simple is good. I love guys like you!

name: Evil Eye Beast, Ominakitty
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The lost place represents anger and despair.

name: Spallation Reactor Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name attacks, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Crush all who do not comply. Leave no trace behind.

name: Cosmic Prison Warden, Jailas
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may choose one of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison. If you chose a card, your opponent puts that card into hand, and this unit gets [Power] +20000 until end of turn.
flavor: It's a live bait. To catch a greater evil.

name: Gravidia Willameht
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your vanguard is "Gore Gravidia, Nordlinger Masques", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Lest the honored one be defiled by this blood.

name: Transforming Patrol, Polizeiaroto
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your vanguard is "Cardinal Mors, Orfist Masques", this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Absolute justice does not exist in this world.

name: Splinter of Progression, Spalkchamber
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your grade 2 or greater set order is put into the order zone, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Don't hesitate! There's something you want to do, right!?

name: Stout Fist Dragon, Elanverse Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):If your set order was put into drop from the order zone this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: No rules! That's reassuring!

name: Plage Batoidea
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [COST][retire this unit], choose a set order from your drop, and put it into hand.
flavor: It is natural for life to seek a comfortable place to live.

name: ReVaMP Ⅶ-03
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Dragontree" or "Masques" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Look to operate in harsher environments.

name: Knight of Elegance, Melvywn
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if the sum of your units' grades is 12 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: To think that the day we'll walk the same path would come so soon.

name: Dimsemitter Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed on (RC) from deck, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and return it to hand.
flavor: Don't waste your troops. Pieces should be used effectively.

name: Indomitable Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent's vanguard's grade is greater than your vanguard's grade, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Doctors can't just leave their patients and run away!

name: Knight of Ferocity, Aenghus
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if the number of your rear-guards is greater than your opponent's by two or more, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: We have to push through before they rebuild their lines.

name: Knight of Gallantry, Azlouis
effect: [CONT](Hand):When a grade 3 card would be revealed from your hand for the cost of your card's ability, this card may be revealed as a grade 3 card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 vanguard with "Bastion" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and put it on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: A knight stands at the boundary between the sky and the earth.

name: Knight of Lucidity, Blethyn
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and choose one of your opponent's rear-guards. Your opponent puts all of their cards from (RC) and drop with the same card name as the chosen unit on the bottom of the deck in any order.
flavor: The golden spear purifies all who associate themselves with demons.

name: Generous Flute Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from hand], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into hand, and put the rest on the top of the deck.
flavor: It'd be great if this sound reaches you too...

name: Decorazor Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other unit in the same column as this unit attacks, that unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: They have a reputation of decorating bandages and casts in a cute way.

name: Marine General of the Surrounding Seas, Aniketos
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your grade 1 or less rear-guards.
flavor: It is the duty of a general to show the new recruits the true path!

name: Thriving Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, call up to one Plant token to (RC) as [Rest]. (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Sprout, o' child of new verdure.

name: Corroze Neurotoxin
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & bind an order card from drop], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each grade of the card bound for this cost.
flavor: Feels good, eh? That moment when the loaded bullet is fired!

name: Lament Fairy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from drop during your turn, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: What spills out of the mouth is a refrain that laments the dead.

name: Ballistic Dragon
effect: [CONT](GC):During the fourth battle of this turn or more, if you have a vanguard with "Flagburg" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: The headliner always arrives late!

name: Water-force Brave Shooter
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played a normal order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[CONT](RC):If your unit [Stand] by a card's ability this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Remember this! You can do it when you're riding the waves!

name: Pulsating Hood
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard the top two cards of the deck], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Bad wolves no longer exist in this forest.

name: Rosearea Inhabitant, Chipmars
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When three or more plant gauges are discarded at the same time for the cost of your card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: No one will notice if I take just a little bite!

name: Sealed Blaze Hammer, Suriiya
effect: Right Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"[AUTO](VC):When this card is armed, choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, retire it, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put this card into drop], choose a card with the Right Deity Arms ability and a different card name from this card from your drop, and put it into hand.

name: Sealed Blaze Axe, Tvashtar
effect: Left Deity Arms - "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra"[CONT](VC):During the battle your vanguard attacked, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this card into drop], choose a card with the Left Deity Arms ability and a different card name from this card from your drop, and arm it to your vanguard.

name: Scarlet Flame War General, Bravaldin
effect: [CONT](Deck):While this card is revealed by the ability of your vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, this card is also regarded as grade 1 and 2.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Gandeeva" in its card name, [COST][bind a card from hand face down], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire a card, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Vairlord
effect: [overDress] - "Trickmoon"[CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by the [overDress] ability, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to a total of two Arms cards from your hand or drop, arm one to your vanguard from among them, and put the rest into soul.[DressBoost] - [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts in the [overDress] state, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each card your vanguard is armed with.

name: Red Jeweled Beast, Galnet
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Draw a card.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Evil Eye Dragon, Ominagruzio
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Ominagruzio" in its card name or up to one "Masque of Hydragrum" from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one trigger unit from your drop, bind it, and until end of turn, your opponent cannot increase [Power] with trigger effects of cards with the same trigger icon as any card in your bind zone.

name: Evil Eye Dragon Emperor, Ominagruzio Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Ominagruzio" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Ominagruzio" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose up to one trigger unit from your drop, bind it, and this unit gets "[CONT](VC):All of your opponent's cards with the same trigger icon as any card in your bind zone get [Shield] -5000, and your opponent cannot increase [Power] with those trigger effects." until end of turn.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two back row rear-guards into soul], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Purple Jeweled Beast, Almethys
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - [Counter-Charge 1].・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Cardinal Mors, Orfist Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Orfist" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Orfist" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose a World card from your drop, and put it into the order zone.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put any number of World cards from the order zone into drop], and call Shadow Army tokens up to the same number of cards put into drop for this cost to your (RC) with a unit. If you called two or more tokens, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle.

name: Gore Gravidia, Nordlinger Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Nordlinger" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Nordlinger" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose up to three Meteorite cards from your drop, and put them into hand.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put any number of Meteorite cards from the order zone into drop], for every two Meteorite cards put into drop for this cost, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC). If four or more Meteorite cards were put into drop for this cost, your trigger effects activate twice until end of that battle.

name: White Jeweled Beast, Synthetica
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Choose a set order from your drop, and put it into hand.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Sword of the Nation, Bastion Accord
effect: [CONT](VC):This unit is also regarded as "Apex Ruler, Bastion".[CONT](VC):All of your grade 3 or greater front row rear-guards cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, and get [Power] +5000.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose one of your grade 3 or less rear-guards, [Stand] it, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card with "Bastion" in its card name from hand], and until end of that battle, this unit performs drive checks." until end of turn.

name: Sagely Dragon, Wisdomclaw Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from deck, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Solrairon" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of the deck. Then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck, and you may call it to an open (RC) if it is a unit card. If you did not call a card, put it into soul.

name: Yellow Jeweled Beast, Tolpaz
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with grade less than or equal to your vanguard from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. If it is not your main phase, [Rest] that called unit.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast King of Calamity, Magnolia Masques
effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Magnolia" in its card name.[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your rear-guards on (RC) with a Dragontree marker can attack from the back row, and get [Power] +10000.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Magnolia" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], and this unit gets "[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard attacks a vanguard from the back row, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it." until end of turn.

name: Green Jeweled Beast, Elmedar
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][put a total of two cards from soul or drop that were in the ride deck into ride deck face up], and perform either of the following according to the circle this unit is on.・(RC) - [Soul-Charge 2], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・(GC) ‐ This unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Rosarium Fairy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][retire another rear-guard], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Granfia" or "Lianorn" in its card name, and your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, choose one of your other back row rear-guards, and increase this unit's [Power] by that unit's [Power] until end of that battle.

name: Explosives Equip Dragon, Launcharred
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Nirvana" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a rear-guard in the XoverDress state, this unit gets "Boost".

name: Dragritter, Basila
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your battle phase, put this card into soul, choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Dvistiya

name: Wild Bullet of Dust Storm, Clifton
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, if your opponent's rear-guard was retired by the ability of your vanguard this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC).[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, if you have a vanguard with "Eugene" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose up to three cards from your soul, and if you chose one or more cards, return them to the deck and shuffle it. If you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Yatara
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your (VC) has two or more Arms, or you have a rear-guard with two or more originalDress, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Whiplash Dragon, Whipasaurus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard's grade is greater than your opponent's vanguard's grade, you may [Soul-Charge 2].

name: Fierce Strike Dragon, Fillingrex
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have a vanguard with [Critical] 2 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Diabolos Rapid-carrier, Geno

If you [Stand] two units, they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO]Front Row (RC):At the end of your turn, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][put this unit into soul], choose a normal unit from your soul, and you may put it into hand.

name: Misery Wing Dragon

effect: [CONT](RC):When any of your opponent's normal units would be put from (RC) into soul by the ability of your vanguard with "Baromagnes" in its card name, your opponent puts those units on the bottom of their deck in any order instead of into soul.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for every five cards in your soul.

name: Ruin Collector
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may [Soul-Charge 1].[CONT](RC):When this unit would be put into soul for the cost of the ability of your vanguard with "Ominagruzio" in its card name, it may be regarded as putting two units.

name: Cannonfire Bullet Rain Colossus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], for each type of trigger icon in your bind zone, this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle.

effect: [AUTO](RC):When you "Final Rush", this unit gets "[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time." and [Power] +5000 until end of turn. At the end of that turn, retire this unit.

name: Blinklock Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into soul from (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if this unit is on a (RC) with a Dragontree marker, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 3 or greater unit card from your drop, and put it into hand.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lepcor

name: Vairlord

effect: [CONT]:This card can only be ridden from a grade 3 card with "Orfist" in its card name.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Remove a card with "Orfist" in its different card name from this unit from hand, soul, or drop], choose a World card from your drop, and put it into the order zone.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put any number of World cards from the order zone into drop], and call Shadow Army tokens up to the same number of cards put into drop for this cost to your (RC) with a unit. If you called two or more tokens, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle.
